name: Good Boy: Unleashed
description:
[An escort mission through the park, where you are a dog and your human is a very boring one, done for the GMTK2020 - out of control].

THEME:
Inside of you there are two dogs, one wants to be a good boy, one wants to be free. Your walk on the park will depend on how you balance both.

OBJECTIVES:
1. do not be a bad boy! (not too much)
going far from your owner scores you bad-boy points, too many bad-boy points and your walk on the park will be cancelled early :(
2. enjoy life's pleasures:
you like your owner, he makes you happy, but you would rather spend your time running around. Balance is key.
3. the world is distracting, embrace that.

CONTROLS:
Mouse only. The dog will go towards the mouse cursor. The camera moves automatically towards the closest interest points.

Credits:
@titwin: Implementation, design
@saltadrow: design, sound, music inspired from: Initial D - deja vu
@solroo: Implementation, art

Acknowledgments:
* Mainly inspired by this gif
* Main dog based on the work of fulifuli
* Speed lines from here (creative commons)
